response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. It comes with a range of features designed to enhance your daily experience. Given its quality and functionality, we believe it's worth more than $120. Considering this, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you for $150. This price includes a limited-time discount, making it a great opportunity for you to own something truly special. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this offer.", "product_price": 150}
